name: Egypt Templ Shoot - Ball Stone Age
name_original: Egypt Templ Shoot - Ball Stone Age
description:
Egypt Templ Shoot - Ball Stone Age is a brand new and amazing bubble shooter style game.
For the legendary treasure, you have to survive over six secret scenes in adventure mode.
Complete all levels, and try to get three stars in each level.
How to play:

1. Shoot ball to match three or more of the same color balls.
2. Tap the weapon to swapping the current ball and the next ball.
3. Combo and power-ups to high score.
